      • loadProperties

        public static void loadProperties(java.io.InputStream input,
                  boolean keepInvalidLines,
                  CHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> target)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Load a map from a properties-like file.
        Parameters:
        input - the InputStream to read from.
        keepInvalidLines - whether or not to save invalid lines under backup keys.
        target - the map to put the loaded keys into.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading from the input fails for some reason.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Description copied from class: StorageSegment
        Flush the segment. This attempts to make sure that all data is stored on disk (or somewhere else, depending on the provider). If this is not called, data might not be saved!
        Specified by:
        flush in class StorageSegment

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from class: StorageSegment
        Close the segment. This includes flushing the segment if applicable. The segment may be unusable once this is called. Do not use the segment afterwards.
        Specified by:
        close in class StorageSegment

        Returns:
